channel.title: Comments on: Optimizing with indexing where commonly overlooked
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Joannah
item.dc:creator: Joannah
item.content:encoded:
I recently came across your blog and have been reading along. I thought I would leave my first comment. I don’t know what to say except that I have enjoyed reading. Nice blog. I will keep visiting this blog very often.

Joannah

http://myscones.com/

item.title: By: Jerry Hung
item.dc:creator: Jerry Hung
item.content:encoded:
Nice trick, I have to remember it next time

Although I agree it is often overlooked, because in comparison, it’s usually not the most costly section of the code

item.description: This is something I use a lot when a query doesn't want to do a seek
